title: Domaine de Terra Vecchia 2015 Vermentinu-Chardonnay White (Ile de Beauté)
description: Vines close to the east coast of Corsica give this bright, light and fruity wine. Crisp acidity is fleshed out with creamed apple and pear fruit. The wine is delicious to drink now.

title: Trapiche 2016 Costa & Pampa Sauvignon Blanc (Buenos Aires)
description: Citrusy aromas suggest white grapefruit. Plump but balanced in feel, this tastes a bit salty and briny, maybe a reflection of its partial coastal grapes, something that's new to Argentina. The briny tangy finish is interesting.

title: Vini 2015 Veni Vidi Vici Sauvignon Blanc (Thracian Valley)
description: Crisp yet slightly tart in the mouth, this wine exhibits pleasant flavors of Granny Smith apple, lemon custard, and fresh white peach.

title: Sacred Hill 2014 Chardonnay (Hawke's Bay)
description: This is a simple, fruit-driven white wine, ideal as an apéritif or for patio-sipping. Pear, melon and pineapple notes mingle easily on the nose and palate, finishing moderately long.

title: La Catrina NV Red (California)
description: This wine is all grapey, jammy deliciousness. It's light-bodied, but full of blackberry jam and grape-jelly flavors, and hard to resist.

title: La Palazzetta 2014  Rosso di Montalcino
description: Intensely floral aromas of violet and iris lead the nose along with a whiff of menthol. The one-dimensional palate offers black cherry, cranberry and licorice alongside bright acidity and fine-grained tannins. Despite the hint of evident alcohol on the finish, this is surprisingly easy drinking.

title: Lambardi 2014  Rosso di Montalcino
description: Aromas of Mediterranean scrub, violet, wild berry and a whiff of menthol lead the nose on this bright, easygoing red. The racy, straightforward palate offers sour cherry, pomegranate and a hint of star anise alongside zesty acidity and smooth tannins. A blast of orange closes the finish.

title: Prophet's Rock 2014 Rocky Point Pinot Gris (Central Otago)
description: Rocky Point, the second label of Prophet's Rock, sometimes approaches first-wine quality. This vintage of Pinot Gris is a bit sweet and broad, but offers luscious hints of apricot, honey and a dusting of dried spices.

title: Putah Creek 2013 Grenache (Solano County)
description: This full-bodied wine has big aromas like baking spices, prunes and figs, while flavors recalling maple syrup and chocolate seem to coat the palate. Although technically dry, it feels sweet and lush.

title: Pian delle Vigne 2014  Rosso di Montalcino
description: Aromas of wild berry, violet and forest floor carry over to the easygoing palate. It's soft and quaffable, with supple tannins and vibrant acidity. Enjoy now with hearty pasta dishes or thick Tuscan soups.

title: Tom Gore 2014 Cabernet Sauvignon (California)
description: This easygoing, generously fruity wine has candied fruit aromas, just enough tannin for balance and leaves a nice blackberry nuance on the finish.

title: Tortoise Creek 2015 Mission Grove Pinot Noir (California)
description: Attractive floral aromas and bright cherry and raspberry flavors make a light, refreshing impression. This medium-bodied wine has light tannins and lively acidity in the texture.

title: Yves Leccia 2015 YL Rosé (Ile de Beauté)
description: An attractively crisp wine, this has fragrant acidity and a lively raspberry-fruit character cut with a tight mineral edge. The wine is ready to drink.

title: Abad Dom Bueno 2015 Godello (Bierzo)
description: Aromas of white peach and dusty minerals lead to a chunky palate that struggles to maintain its shape and cut. Pithy, lightly bitter peach and citrus flavors end with the sensation of licking a peach pit.

title: Anew 2015 Pinot Grigio (Columbia Valley (WA))
description: Light aromas of pear, white flowers and melon lead to dry, medium-bodied fruit flavors. It doesn't bring much complexity but still offers plenty of appeal.

title: Bailly-Lapierre NV Paul Delane Réserve Brut  (Crémant de Bourgogne)
description: Grapes from the small village of Saint-Bris le Vineux west of Chablis are used in this attractive, crisp and fruity wine. It has a strongly mineral tang to its fruitiness with lemon zest and intense acidity. The aftertaste is softer, rounded and ready to drink.

title: Clos Teddi 2015 Vermentino (Patrimonio)
description: The perfumed character of this pure Vermentino is right up front. It gives the wine its ripe character and fine orange blossom aromas. The wine is crisp, juicy and with a refreshing aftertaste.

title: Collegiale des Domaines de Loire 2015 Domaine Desloges Sauvignon Blanc (Touraine)
description: This is an immediately attractive, fruity wine. With its crisply herbal texture, white-currant fruits and touch of pepper, it is a balanced, young wine that is ready to drink.

title: Cono Sur 2015 Single Vineyard Block No. 5 Quebrada Alta Chardonnay (Casablanca Valley)
description: Briny citrus and apple aromas are zesty to say the least. A high-acid palate creates a shearing citrusy feel, while this tastes of lime, tangerine and little-to-no oak. A tangy finish turns slightly pithy and bitter.
designation: Single Vineyard Block No. 5 Quebrada Alta

title: Crocedimezzo 2014  Rosso di Montalcino
description: Young and racy, this has aromas of moist earth, red berry and chopped aromatic herb. The tangy, light-bodied palate offers strawberry, sour cherry, orange peel and a touch of clove alongside firm acidity and refined tannins. It cries out for food and would pair well with hearty pasta dishes topped with thick tomato-based sauces and savory soups.

title: Cave de Bissey NV Brut Rosé  (Crémant de Bourgogne)
description: This crisp blend of Aligoté, Gamay and Pinot Noir is bright with red fruits and textured with acidity. The fruits give a ripe character to the wine with their attractive soft aftertaste. Drink now.

title: Cave de Saumur NV La Petite Marquise Brut Sparkling (Crémant de Loire)
description: This blend of Chenin Blanc, Chardonnay and Cabernet Franc is crisp, bright with a touch of minerality as well as ripe apple and grapefruit flavors. It is an immediately drinkable wine that is shot through with acidity at the end.

title: Cellers Tarroné 2014 Punt i... Garnacha-Syrah (Terra Alta)
description: This Garnacha-Syrah blend smells cheesy, raisiny and overoaked, especially at first, when it hits with a strong note of pepper. The palate is lively but cushioned, while herbal cherry and prune flavors turn soft and jammy on the finish.

title: Bedell 2013 Taste Red (North Fork of Long Island)
description: Sweeter whiffs of milk chocolate, baking spice and graham cracker accenting black fruit on the nose are replaced by more herbaceous tones of herb and bramble on the palate of this red blend. It's a juicy intensely ripened wine with brisk acidity and bold penetrating tannins on the finish. Drink now through 2021.

title: Bolla 2015 Tufaie  (Soave Classico)
description: Aromas of ripe orchard fruit, pressed flower and a whiff of citrus zest take center stage on this enjoyable white. The bright palate offers golden apple and pear while a note of bitter almond closes the finish.

title: Carpineto 2014  Rosso di Montalcino
description: This zesty red has pretty aromas that suggest small red berry, blue flower and a whiff of moist soil. The vibrant palate offers sour cherry, pomegranate and a hint of anise alongside zesty acidity and refined tannins.

title: Casisano Tommasi 2014  Rosso di Montalcino
description: Violet, raspberry, underbrush and wild herb aromas take center stage on this straightforward red. The lean, racy palate offers sour cherry and orange peel alongside vigorous acidity. This cries out for food, so enjoy it with hearty soups and pasta dishes.

title: Tbilvino 2014 Georgian Valleys Alazani Valley Rkatsiteli (Kakheti)
description: Deep straw in color, this semi-sweet wine made from an indigenous Georgian grape has an aroma characterized by soft hints of apple. It is harmonious in the mouth, with flavors of ripe apple, white peach and apricot that meld into a finish marked by persistent floral sweetness.

title: Rustenberg 2015 Petit Verdot Rosé (Simonsberg-Stellenbosch)
description: A rich pink color, this opens with pretty floral aromas of sweet pea and peony that are framed by red cherry and raspberry tones. It's attractive and bright on the palate, with forward red-fruit flavors and delicate sweet-spice accents that unfold on the close. Drink now.

title: Rutini 2015 Encuentro Chardonnay (Mendoza)
description: Aromas of baked apple and apple cider are limited in scope. This Chardonnay has a heavy, oily mouthfeel with adequate acidity. Chunky flavors of salty apple and stone fruits finish with a creamy texture and a note of creamed corn. Drink now.
